name: Out Of Your Mind (itch) (Thomas Boone)
description:
CONTROLS:

Move around = WASD / Left joystick

Jump = Spacebar / A

Shoot tears (only in the latter two levels) = Left click / Right shoulder button

In this prototype, you venture into the mind of Mr. Psyman in order to wake him up again. Only the five stages of grief are shown here, but the idea is to have multiple psychological domains covered if this would be a full game.
